characters.story: "JUNG!" the metal and heavy sing cheerfully - to draw together, concentrate and focus!

"TUNG?" the sickness questions curiously - does it hurt, ache and pain?
"YOO!" the sickness commands sharply to get better more and more - to heal the scars!
